comments.body: Are you able to give a bit more info, seems like it's just a byte array represented by hex values but would be good to see that in the documentation.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +47,51 @@  raw_data:
    description:
      - Binary data associated with the log entry.
      - Value must be a comma-separated array of 8-bit unsigned integers (0 to 255).
notes:
